entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
